channel.title: Vadim Bauer on Container Registry
channel.description: Recent content in Vadim Bauer on Container Registry

item.title: 3 Ways to overcome the new Docker Hub pull rate limit
item.description: and also improve the auditability. The Problem As someone who is working with Docker Containers you certainly have heard about the new Docker Hub pull rate limit restrictions, taking effect from the 2nd November 2020. Maybe you are already here because you are seeing this error message and wondering how to resolve it docker pull wordpress:latest Error response from daemon: pull access denied for wordpress, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login': denied: You have reached your pull rate limit.
